task.summary: Moved ValidationException to remove vertx-web-api-contract dep
Created Pre/Post schema validation code Added enum schema Added new schemas Refactored TestVerticle
Added test jsons for oas 3 (from draft-6) and created OAS3IntegrationTest
Removed useless subclasses and started work on boolean/array

expression.expression-string:
new JsonObject("{
" + " "description": "one supplementary Unicode code point is not long enough",
" + " "data": "\uD83D\uDCA9",
" + " "valid": false
" + " }").getString("data").codePointCount(0, 2)

new JsonObject("{
" + " "description": "one supplementary Unicode code point is not long enough",
" + " "data": "\uD83D\uDCA9",
" + " "valid": false
" + " }").getString("data").codePointCount(0, 4)

new JsonObject(" {
" + " "description": "two supplementary Unicode code points is long enough",
" + " "data": "\uD83D\uDCA9\uD83D\uDCA9",
" + " "valid": true
" + " }").getString("data").codePointCount(0, 4)

new JsonObject(" {
" + " "description": "two supplementary Unicode code points is long enough",
" + " "data": "\uD83D\uDCA9\uD83D\uDCA9",
" + " "valid": true
" + " }")
